name: The Treasured Medallion
description:
Manuel Cantez thought he had the perfect plan. All he had to do was hide the statue until it was safe. But when a freak storm washed him overboard, all his dreams came crashing down. But for Debbie Johnson, this was only the beginning, as she embarks on an adventure to find the truth behind Manuel's disappearance. A truth that will have her scouring the dense jungle for clues, making deals with people that may not have her best interests at heart and even confronting the evil Chickcharnie, a mythical creature that will protect what's his...at all costs.

  • 350+ rooms to explore
  • Over 60 characters to interact with
  • A journal to keep track of your progress
  • Interactive puzzles
  • Restore points on death scenes
  • Double-click to instantly change rooms
